log.content: I would like you to create an svg image of a sunset through the mountains. Make sure the result is visible in index.html

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"file_name":"index.html","content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>Sunset Over Mountains</title>
</head>
<body>
  <svg width="100%" height="100vh" viewBox="0 0 100 50" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <defs>
      <linearGradient id="skyGradient" gradientTransform="rotate(90)">
        <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFD700" />
        <stop offset="30%" stop-color="#FFA500" />
        <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#87CEEB" />
      </linearGradient>
    </defs>
    <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="url(#skyGradient)"/>
    <!-- Mountains -->
    <path d="M 10 45 L 30 15 L 50 45 Z" fill="#2C3E50" />
    <path d="M 40 40 L 60 10 L 80 40 Z" fill="#293F4F" />
    <path d="M 70 35 L 90 5 L 110 35 Z" fill="#243B4E" />
  </svg>
</body>
</html>"}
